English.Text:
Proposed locations for our research station:
Upon an offshore ice platform South of here. Pros: Isolated. Cons: Melty.
At the foot of a tall mountain which ends in the sea, West of here. Pros: The mountain shields us from storms. Cons: Signs of human activityâ€” we may be disturbed by locals.
At the end of a crevasse to the North. Pros: I can throw Musgrave in the sealhole if he interferes with my researches again. Cons: Musgrave might have the same idea.
